sentences.en: Microscopic examination of a cell's chromosomes can reveal the sex of the fetus.

sentences.en: Phytoplankton are microscopic plants that grow in the ocean.
sentences.cn: 浮游植物是生长在海里的微小植物。

sentences.en: Even today, microscopic meteorites continually bombard Earth, falling on both land and sea.
sentences.cn: 即使是现在，微小的陨石仍在不断地撞击地球，然后落到陆地上和大海中。
